description.line: For external manager with only one department (e.g., LAB) -- display the rooms of the department right away.
Fixed display problem of departmental room features (sometimes, multiple features were displayed in a single row).
Table ordering corrected (each table can be ordered separately, but only ordering of the class rooms table was actually used).
For external manager with only one department (e.g., LAB) -- display Export PDF button next to other buttons (Search/Export PDF component is not present).
StudentImport and LastLikeCourseDemandImport are now inherited from BaseImport.
StudentImport: speed improved by not using StudentDAO.save(student); all students for given academic session are deleted first
LastLikeCourseDemandImport: all last-like course demands for given academic session are deleted first
Data Import page now uploads the selected file (using Struts file upload).
Added methods for cloning of instructional offerings and all underlaying objects (configurations, subparts, classes, etc).
Room Features, Room Groups: Abbreviation column added
Room Detail, Room Edit: Administrator can see and change external id.
Room Detail, Room Edit: Administrator can change room type (property Room.scheduledRoomType).
Allow Add Special Use Room only when external rooms are populated for the given session.
Added add any room capability (administrator only).
Made screen more intuitive.
Display of the selected date pattern corrected.

Fix Generated feature improved replace the generated date pattern with an existing one if the difference is not more than 5 days otherwise rename the generated date pattern to "generated start - end" where start and end are start and end days in MM/dd format
Subject Areas: Struts configuration corrected.
Buildings: Add/update/delete functions added.
Buildings, Timetable Managers, Departments, Subject Areas, Solver Groups: Export PDF function added.
Application Config: Display all effective properties set for the application.
FAQ and Tips & Tricks pages moved to wiki.
Instructor Lookup: Fixed problem with I2A2 lookup (No getter method for property: "puid" of bean: "i2a2") -- User object has no longer method getPuid(), but it has getId().
Instructor Delete: Fixed hibernate problem (deleted object would be re-saved by cascade) when an instructor with some class assignments was deleted.
Distribution preferences that are set on instructors were not filtered by course number, this is now corrected.
Add/Edit Distribution Preference: Compare classes using ClassComparator, not by their unique ids.
Load academic areas, classifications, majors, and minors
Solver update, https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/cpsolver-cvs for more details.
Database connection properties can be set in custom.property file
Buildings: Minor change to remove non-existent building as part of update process.
Major Import: Create empty set for academic areas if null.
Configuration Edit: Fixed org.hibernate.PropertyAccessException (Exception occurred inside setter of org.unitime.timetable.model.Class_.managingDept)
ChangeLog: queries made cacheable.
Last-like Course Demands Import: speed up -- cache the SubjectAreas and CourseOfferings.
Timetabling CSS: Fixed a bug.
WebTable: Removed italic tag and instead depend on css to do all formatting
Changed logos to remove SMAS and put unitime.org.
File footer.jsp removed -- it is not used.
Tags propertyEquals and propertyNotEquals added.
Use property tags instead of using ApplicationProperties class directly in JSPs.
This is a first Open Source release of this application.
See http://www.unitime.org for more details.
